Plugin

Also, we used Raytracing (GPU Lightmass) for baking lightmaps.

Gameplay Instructions

-  You need to press the right stick of the controller to teleport   

-  Use the left stick of the controller to turn around

-  To interact with active elements, you need to push  on them 

-  Active objects are marked with a green circle
